---
title: "Supporting code for Macedo-Lima et al., 2024 Current Biology"
---

The code illustrated in this website is read-only. For modifiable files, download .Rmd files

More analyses can be found in associated python notebook and MatLab pipelines.

The workflow for most datasets in this project was:

1. Raw data collection with MatLab or Intan/Synapse software

2. Data preprocessing with MatLab pipeline

3. Data preprocessing and plotting with Python pipeline

4. Data analysis and plotting with R pipeline
